data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Haveri access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Haveri, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Haveri, Karnataka, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Haveri.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Haveri, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Vakkaliga people might believe through him.
Spirit, teach the children in the county of Haveri to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Haveri, Karnataka, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Haveri, Karnataka, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

location.name: Haveri
location.people_groups_list: Mundala, Vallan, Brahmin Sholiar, Rajpur, Vakkaliga Kunchitiga
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mundala (28,000), Vallan (900), Brahmin Sholiar (48,000), Rajpur (50,000), Vakkaliga Kunchitiga (241,000)
